name: Portland Japanese Garden
description: Large Japanese garden with beautiful Japanese landscaping, tranquil ponds, and a traditional tea house. Nice, serene escape from the city.

name: International Rose Test Garden
description: Beautiful rose gardens with over 10,000 rose bushes representing more than 650 varieties. Great views of Portland and Mount Hood. Roses are in bloom late May through October.

name: Hat Yai Belmont
description: Casual counter-service restaurant that specializes in Southern Thai food including fried chicken, curry, and roti. Fun cocktails. No reservations.

name: Hopscotch Portland
description: Hopscotch is an immersive and experiential brand that brings together artists in collaborative environments to create unique, impactful, and distinct shared experiences.

name: Broder Nord
description: Known for its cozy and welcoming atmosphere, Broder Nord offers a delicious menu featuring traditional Nordic cuisine with a modern twist. Guests can enjoy dishes such as Swedish meatballs, smoked trout, and various open-faced sandwiches known as smørrebrød, all made with fresh, locally-sourced ingredients.

name: Nostrana
description: Renowned for its authentic yet innovative approach to Italian cuisine, Nostrana offers a menu that celebrates the flavors of Italy while incorporating locally-sourced ingredients from the Pacific Northwest.

name: Bernstein's Bagels
description: Bernstein's Bagels has gained a loyal following for its handcrafted, New York-style bagels made with traditional techniques and high-quality ingredients.

name: Hey Love
description: Specializing in modern comfort food, artisanal cocktails, and a fusion of different cuisines, Hey Love is a cozy, intimate yet lively restaurant that is perfect for friends, couples, or families.

name: Hapa PDX Ramen & Whiskey
description: Hapa PDX Ramen & Whiskey is a dynamic restaurant known for its innovative fusion of Japanese ramen and American whiskey culture.

name: Crystal Springs Rhododendron Garden
description: Situated on the eastern edge of the city, the garden spans over 9 acres and features a stunning collection of rhododendrons, azaleas, and other flowering plants, making it a popular destination for nature lovers, photographers, and outdoor enthusiasts.

name: Powell's City of Books
description: Powell's City of Books one of the largest independent bookstores in the world and is renowned for its vast selection of new, used, and rare books spanning a wide range of genres and subjects.

name: Portland Nursery
description: The nursery offers a wide variety of plants, trees, shrubs, flowers, and gardening supplies to meet the needs of both novice and experienced gardeners. Whether you're looking to start a vegetable garden, create a colorful flower bed, or add some greenery to your indoor space, Portland Nursery provides a diverse selection of high-quality plants and gardening products.

name: QuarterWorld Arcade
description: QuarterWorld Arcade is a popular arcade and entertainment venue. It offers a nostalgic and fun-filled experience for visitors of all ages, featuring a wide variety of classic and modern arcade games, pinball machines, and other interactive attractions.

name: Brujos Brewing
description: Brujos Brewing is a craft brewery known for its creative and innovative approach to brewing beer. The brewery takes its name from the Spanish word "brujos," meaning "witches" or "sorcerers," reflecting its adventurous spirit and commitment to pushing the boundaries of traditional beer styles.

name: Breakside Brewery
description: The brewery is renowned for its diverse range of beer styles, including IPAs, stouts, lagers, sour ales, and experimental brews. Breakside Brewery has garnered numerous awards and accolades for its beers, reflecting its commitment to quality and innovation in brewing.

name: StormBreaker Brewing
description: StormBreaker Brewing is known for its wide range of beer styles, including IPAs, stouts, porters, lagers, and seasonal specialties. The brewery prides itself on using locally-sourced ingredients whenever possible and prioritizes quality and creativity in its brewing process.

name: Marshall Park
description: One of the notable features of Marshall Park is its lush and verdant forested areas, which provide ample opportunities for hiking, nature walks, and birdwatching. The park is crisscrossed by a network of trails that wind through towering fir and cedar trees, creating a tranquil atmosphere that's perfect for outdoor recreation and relaxation.

name: CARTOPIA FOOD CARTS
description: Cartopia offers visitors a diverse and vibrant dining experience with a variety of food carts serving up delicious cuisine from around the world.

name: Hawthorne Asylum Food Cart Pod
description: At Hawthorne Asylum, you'll find a mix of traditional favorites and innovative creations, with each food cart showcasing its own unique style and specialty. From mouthwatering tacos and savory BBQ to gourmet grilled cheese sandwiches and exotic vegan bowls, there's something to satisfy every craving and dietary preference.
address: SE 10th Ave &, 1080 SE Madison St, Portland, OR 97214

name: Birrieria La Plaza - Birria de Res | Mexican Food Truck & Taqueria
description: At Birrieria La Plaza, guests can indulge in a variety of birria de res offerings, including tacos, quesadillas, burritos, and even birria ramen bowls, each bursting with rich, savory flavors and tender, melt-in-your-mouth beef. The tacos are served with freshly chopped onions, cilantro, and a squeeze of lime, while the consommé provides the perfect dipping sauce for soaking up every last bit of flavor.
address: 10114 SE Division St A, Portland, OR 97266
